verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician אַל־ תַּ֭שְׁחֵת <WH516> Altaschith לְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> of David מִכְתָּ֑ם <WH4387> Michtam בְּבָרְח֥וֹ <WH1272> when he fled מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> from שָׁ֝א֗וּל <WH7586> Saul בַּמְּעָרָֽה׃ <WH4631> in the cave חָנֵּ֤נִי <WH2603> Be merciful אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <WH430> unto me O God חָנֵּ֗נִי <WH2603> be merciful כִּ֥י <WH3588> for בְךָ֮ חָסָ֪יָה <WH2620> trusteth נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> unto me for my soul וּבְצֵֽל־ <WH6738> in thee yea in the shadow כְּנָפֶ֥יךָ <WH3671> of thy wings אֶחְסֶ֑ה <WH2620> will I make my refuge עַ֝֗ד <WH5704> Until יַעֲבֹ֥ר <WH5674> be overpast הַוּֽוֹת׃ <WH1942> until [these] calamities
אֶ֭קְרָא <WH7121> I will cry לֵֽאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> unto God עֶלְי֑וֹן <WH5945> most high לָ֝אֵ֗ל <WH410> unto God גֹּמֵ֥ר <WH1584> that performeth עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> and

יִשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> He shall send מִשָּׁמַ֨יִם ׀ <WH8064> from heaven וְֽיוֹשִׁיעֵ֗נִי <WH3467> and save חֵרֵ֣ף <WH2778> me [from] the reproach שֹׁאֲפִ֣י <WH7602> of him that would swallow me up סֶ֑לָה <WH5542> Selah יִשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> shall send forth אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> God חַסְדּ֥וֹ <WH2617> his mercy וַאֲמִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH571> and his truth

נַפְשִׁ֤י ׀ <WH5315> My soul בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> [is] among לְבָאִם֮ <WH3833> lions אֶשְׁכְּבָ֪ה <WH7901> [and] I lie לֹ֫הֲטִ֥ים <WH3857> [even among] them that are set on fire בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> [even] the sons אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of men שִׁ֭נֵּיהֶם <WH8127> whose teeth חֲנִ֣ית <WH2595> [are] spears וְחִצִּ֑ים <WH2671> and arrows וּ֝לְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <WH3956> and their tongue חֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> sword חַדָּֽה׃ <WH2299> a sharp

ר֣וּמָה <WH7311> Be thou exalted עַל־ <WH5921> above הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> above the heavens אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> O God עַ֖ל <WH5921> above כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> [be] above all the earth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3519> [let] thy glory

רֶ֤שֶׁת ׀ <WH7568> a net הֵכִ֣ינוּ <WH3559> They have prepared לִפְעָמַי֮ <WH6471> for my steps כָּפַ֪ף <WH3721> is bowed down נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> my soul כָּר֣וּ <WH3738> they have digged לְפָנַ֣י <WH6440> before שִׁיחָ֑ה <WH7882> a pit נָפְל֖וּ <WH5307> whereof they are fallen בְתוֹכָ֣הּ <WH8432> me into the midst סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> [themselves] Selah

נָ֘כ֤וֹן <WH3559> is fixed לִבִּ֣י <WH3820> My heart אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> O God נָכ֣וֹן <WH3559> is fixed לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> my heart אָ֝שִׁ֗ירָה <WH7891> I will sing וַאֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃ <WH2167> and give praise

ע֤וּרָה <WH5782> Awake up כְבוֹדִ֗י <WH3519> my glory ע֭וּרָֽה <WH5782> awake הַנֵּ֥בֶל <WH5035> psaltery וְכִנּ֗וֹר <WH3658> and harp אָעִ֥ירָה <WH5782> I [myself] will awake שָּֽׁחַר׃ <WH7837> early

אוֹדְךָ֖ <WH3034> I will praise בָעַמִּ֥ים ׀ <WH5971> among the people אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> thee O Lord אֲ֝זַמֶּרְךָ֗ <WH2167> I will sing בַּל־ <WH1077> among אֻמִּֽים׃ <WH3816> unto thee among the nations

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גָדֹ֣ל <WH1419> [is] great עַד־ <WH5704> against שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> unto the heavens חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> For thy mercy וְֽעַד־ <WH5704> against שְׁחָקִ֥ים <WH7834> unto the clouds אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH571> and thy truth

ר֣וּמָה <WH7311> Be thou exalted עַל־ <WH5921> above שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> above the heavens אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> O God עַ֖ל <WH5921> above כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> [be] above all the earth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3519> [let] thy glory
